channel.title: Alex Tysen Portfolio
channel.description: Hello! This is Alex. This is an online portfolio.

item.title: I Will Dance
item.dc:creator: alextysen
item.description: Changing colors for you Feeling strange in this room I am now glowing So much keeps me alive Flowers blossom inside A piece of sound And after all the rain is gone I will keep on dancing For dancing is part of my life Dancing is part of my life You won't take that fromContinue reading "I Will Dance"
item.content:encoded:
I Will Dance

Changing colors for you
Feeling strange in this room
I am now glowing

So much keeps me alive
Flowers blossom inside
A piece of sound

And after all the rain is gone
I will keep on dancing
For dancing is part of my life
Dancing is part of my life
You won't take that from me

This is how the man spoke
Words that feel like a stroke
And I will dance

And after all the rain is gone
I will keep on dancing
For dancing is part of my life
Dancing is part of my life
You won't take that from me

This is how the man spoke
This is how I will stroke
And I will dance

I will dance
I will dance
Download

Music and lyrics by Alex Tysen

item.title: The Auditorium
item.dc:creator: alextysen
item.description: The Auditorium’s crowded now Staring at the beat There is a globe that’s covering The crowds beneath my feet Soaking in their sweaty clothes They still raise their hands I give my passions to the world I let the angel’s wings unfold And then the wave’s impossible to hold I become an essence in theirContinue reading "The Auditorium"
item.content:encoded:
The Auditorium

The Auditorium’s crowded now
Staring at the beat
There is a globe that’s covering
The crowds beneath my feet

Soaking in their sweaty clothes
They still raise their hands
I give my passions to the world
I let the angel’s wings unfold
And then the wave’s impossible to hold

I become an essence in their ears
Standing where I loose my fears
Everything is so fantastic...
Or is it maybe just sarcastic?

‘Cause I
Sick inside my mind
Think of you at night
When no one’s there to watch my pain

Tears in the rain
Signs from everywhere
Remind me you’re not with me
Anymore

Not anymore
Not anymore

The auditorium’s empty now
For over is the show
And I keep wondering where I got
The strength to reach my goals

Wet remain their sweaty clothes
And while they're going home 
I turn around to see my face
And what the mirror has to say
And I realise at last it is not worth...

Oh it’s not worth...
It’s not worth waiting for you anymore

‘Cause I
Sick inside my mind
Think of you at night
When no one’s there to watch my pain

Tears in the rain
Signs are everywhere
Remind me you’re not with me 
Anymore

Scars in my soul
The one that broke the mold
Went away from me for
Evermore

Evermore

Download

Music and lyrics by Alex Tysen

item.title: A little piece of sea (html)
item.dc:creator: alextysen
item.description: Siguiéndote A Little Piece of Sea You said This I wouldn’t say But it’s bright like the sunshine In a different way And I Looking at your eyes I just find myself struggling Nothing but trying Not to loose my mind ‘Cause look what I could find Look what I could find My little pieceContinue reading "A little piece of sea (html)"
item.content:encoded:
Siguiéndote

A Little Piece of Sea
You said
This I wouldn’t say
But it’s bright like the sunshine
In a different way
And I
Looking at your eyes
I just find myself struggling
Nothing but trying
Not to loose my mind
‘Cause look what I could find
Look what I could find
My little piece of sea
A marvellous thing for me
Don’t think that I believe but I must say
It feels like heaven
It feels like heaven
And if you say that you cannot come now
I’ll take my bags and just make my way to you
September is for you
If it’s a train or a boat, don’t give a thing
And if the storms wanna catch me on my way
They’ll have to pick someone else
‘Cause I won’t loose my mind
I’ll have you by my side
I’ll have you by my side
My little piece of sea
A marvellous thing for me
When that sigh was released here’s what she said
Could you tell me why are you so sweet?
And I said
There’s no way on earth that I could not be sweet to you!
It feels like heaven
It feels like heaven

– Listen –

-Download-
– Music and Lyrics by Alex Tysen –

item.content:encoded:
A Little Piece of Sea

You said

This I wouldn’t say

But it’s bright like the sunshine

In a different way

And I

Looking at your eyes

I just find myself struggling

Nothing but trying

Not to loose my mind

‘Cause look what I could find

Look what I could find

My little piece of sea

A marvellous thing for me

Don’t think that I believe but I must say

It feels like heaven

It feels like heaven

And if you say that you cannot come now

I’ll take my bags and just make my way to you

September is for you

If it’s a train or a boat, don’t give a thing

And if the storms wanna catch me on my way

They’ll have to pick someone else

‘Cause I won’t loose my mind

I’ll have you by my side

I’ll have you by my side

My little piece of sea

A marvellous thing for me

When that sigh was released here’s what she said

Could you tell me why are you so sweet?

And I said

There’s no way on earth that I could not be sweet to you!

It feels like heaven

It feels like heaven

– Listen –

item.title: Hello world!
